title: Spatial Arrangement and Cognitive Load Management in Augmented Reality Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Non-real-time learning activity design through smartphone-based AR environments, incorporating case-based applications utilizing learners' work experiences

learning_goals: Learners can explain differences in cognitive load based on horizontal/vertical information layout types in AR environments.
Learners can analyze the impact of spatial continuity in augmented reality content on user experience.
Learners can design and evaluate smartphone-based AR learning materials in constrained technological environments.

resources: AR Authoring Tools (Unity/ARKit), Eye-Tracking Test Simulation Software, Smartphone-Compatible LMS Platform
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
